text: allah tan arulinal tankalukkuk kotuttirukkum porutkalil yar ulopattanam ceykirarkalo atu tamakku nallatu enru (avarkal) niccayamaka enna ventam - avvaranru! Atu avarkalukkut tinkutan;. Avarkal ulopattanattal certtu vaitta (porutkal) ellam marumaiyil avarkal kaluttil arikantamaka potappatum;. Vanankal, pumi akiyavarril (irukkum anaittukkum) anantara pattiyatai allahvukke uriyatakum. Allah ninkal ceypavarraiyellam arikiran
